name: The Age of Ninjas
description: Ninja Age box introducing PTR, QR, and XR rarities.
notes: 10 packs of 5 cards. PTR (20 poster cards over 20 years), QR (chibi, /720, hidden /72 — REDEMPTION CHINA ONLY), XR (scroll art, /720). Diamond parallel variants. Two versions: Regular (~$20) and N Edition Noble (~$59).
